    Spacing

    Helper classes for specifying margin or padding spacing to element.

    margin-1
    margin-2
    margin-3
    margin-4
    margin-5

    mt-n5

    Transformation

    Example: hEllo, WoRlD!
    • text-lowercase: hEllo, WoRlD!
    • text-uppercase: hEllo, WoRlD!
    • text-capitalize: hEllo, WoRlD!
